entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
